email_body: sure, how about thursday at 3:30? would like to get update on ENE's lng projects as well. Jonathan Whitehead @ ENRON 04/24/2001 07:28 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: LNG John, I have just arrived in Houston, and will be running the LNG Trading & Shipping business. I worked for Louise for many years, and took over the European Gas business from her when she came over here a few years ago. I'd like to meet you and discuss a few issues. Do you have any time over the next few days? Thanks, Jonathan
